space.name: LCH
space.description: LCH is the polar form of Lab

space.name: sRGB
space.description: The color space of all CSS colors before CSS Color Level 4.

space.name: Display P3
space.description: The color space of most commercial wide gamut screens today. 50% larger gamut (by volume) than sRGB.

space.name: AdobeÂ® RGB Compatible
space.description: Wide gamut RGB color space, encompassed roughly 50% of visible colors.

space.name: REC.2020
space.description: Very wide gamut RGB color space

space.name: ProPhoto
space.description: Very wide gamut RGB color space with primaries outside the range of human vision. Includes 90% of visible colors.

space.name: HSL
space.description: Polar transformation of sRGB, supported as early as CSS Color Level 3.

space.name: HWB
space.description: Another polar transformation of sRGB with hue, whiteness, blackness coordinates.

space.name: HSV
space.description: Another polar transformation of sRGB, supported in Adobe CS software.

space.name: Jzazbz
space.description: Color space that improves on Lab, with much better perceptual uniformity.

optional.name: Interpolation
optional.description: Interpolate between colors, create ranges and scales.

optional.name: DeltaE CMC
optional.description: DeltaE CMC, a color difference metric of intermediate complexity and intermediate accuracy.

optional.name: DeltaE 2000
optional.description: DeltaE 2000, the gold standard in deltaE as of present, but also the most complex. Especially good for small color differences.

optional.name: DeltaE Jz
optional.description: DeltaE based on the Jzazbz color space.

optional.name: Chromatic adaptation
optional.description: Color.js core only suppoorts chromatic adaptation between D50 and D65 using the Bradford method. This module supports chromatic adaptation between arbitrary illuminants (with 9 presets) using Bradford, Van Kries, CAT02, or CAT16.
